price: Isaannan salaata (seera ishee guutanii) dhaabani, waan nuti isaaniif kennine irraas kennitaniidha.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
